page.title: 12Government
page.content: This area is part of Dumfries and Galloway which sends one Member of Parliament to Westminster. A regional council exists and our area has one representative, namely Mr John Jamieson, from Gatehouse. The Regional Council is divided into districts, and these district councils deide on matters relating to their area. Borgue is in the Fleet District and our representative is Mr Nigel Hesketh. Locally we have the Community Council, which comprises of members that live and work around Borgue. These people meet four times a year, and any points which arise are concerning the local area are passed on to the district counciller.
